bibl.title: Begram Reconsidered.
bibl.note: Challenges some current assumptions about the origin and the date of the glass from Begram, Afghanistan. The Roman glass was probably sent by sea from Egypt. Some objects are specifically Egyptian.
bibl.seg: Römisches Glas des 2. bis 6. Jahrhunderts. Der archäologische Befund Berichte aus dem Glassymposium in Köln, 9.-10. Juni 1988 = Kölner Jahrbuch für Vor-und Frühgeschichte 22 (1989) pp. 151-157.
Challenges some current assumptions about the origin and the date of the glass from Begram, Afghanistan. The Roman glass was probably sent by sea from Egypt. Some objects are specifically Egyptian.
